question:
1. Eric is a German engineer.He comes from....    a. France c. French e. German

b. Germany d. Switzerland 

2. Peter is a foreign student, he comes from 

Australia.He speaks.....

a. Australia c. Germany e. British

b. England d. English

3. X : How is your mother today ?

Y : .......

a. I am fine,thanks d. He is not Fine

b. She is fine ,thanks e. He is fine, thanks

c. He is not fine

4. Miss . Chang comes from china.What is her 

nationality?

a. Chinese c. Japanese e. Italy

b. Korea d. French

5. A : .....?

B : British.

a. What’s your address? 

b. What’s your job?

c. What’s your country? 

d. What’s your hobby?

e. What’s your Nationality?

6. Yani : ....,madam? My name is Yani.

Mrs. Asti : How do you do? I am Mrs. Asti.

a. Nice to meet you d. How are you

b. How do you do e. Fine,thank you

c. May I introduce

7. Mrs. Astuti comes f rom United State. She 

speaks.....

a. America c. American e. Dutch

b. England d. spanish

Hello, I’m Silvana ,I’m Italian.I’m from 

Italy.This is my class at the tower language 

school.It’s a small class but it’s nice. The 

students aren’t all from italy ; they are from 

spain , France , Germany and Japan, too. My 

friend sabine is French , she is from Paris , she 

is a new student , but her english is very good. 

Mr. Levis is our teacher , he’s from Manchester. 

He’s very nice and polite. He’s a good teacher.

8. X : Where is Silvana from?

Y Oh, she comes from.....

a. Spain c. Italy e. France

b. England d. Germany

9. X : Who is Silvana’s Teacher ?

Y : Her teacher is......

a. Mrs. Sabine c. Mr. Levis e. Mr. Sabine

b. My friend d. Mrs. Levis

10. X : Where does study now?

Y : She Studies at.....

a. Tower mechanic school

b. Tower school of design

c. Tower stylist school

d. Tower language school

e. Tower gymnastic school

11. Tom : How do you do,Joko?

Joko : How do you do ? I am very happy 

....you

a. Meet c. to meeting e. to meet

b. Meeting d. met

12. A : ...... my name is Toni.I am the first year of

 SMK.

B : I am Rudi. How do you do, Toni ?

a. How do you do ? 

b. How is Toni

c. May I introduce myself?

d. What can I do you for you

e. I would like to introduce you to Toni

13. Nany : Hello, I’m Nany.

Nindy : Hi, I’m Nindy.

Nany : .........

Nindy : I live on Jln. Jenderal Sudirman.

a. How do you do? d. How is Toni?

b. Where do you live? e. How are you?

c. Where are you ?

14. Aldo : Good morning , Mr. Sandra.

Mr. Sandra : Good Morning , Aldo . How are

 You?

Aldo : I’m fine. Thank you.

The underlined greeting above tells us that Aldo 

met Mr. Sandra.....

a. At about eight p.m. d. in the evening

b. In the afternoon e. at night

c. At about seven a.m.

15. Iwan is my best friend, I like ....very much.

a. Him b. His c. he d. she e. we

16. 1. X : Ok, see you later

2. Y : I’m going to visit my grandfather.

3. Y : Good Afternoon.

4. X : Hi, Good afternoon.

5. X : Where are you going?

a. 4 – 3 – 2 – 5 – 1 

b. 4 – 3 – 2 – 1 – 5 

c. 4 – 3 – 5 – 2 – 1

d. 4 – 3 – 5 – 1 – 2

e. 4 – 3 – 1 – 2 – 5

17. If you given some aids. You say thank for.....

a. Giving c. coming e. asking

b. Helping d. kidding

18. These are expression for thanking, except....

a. Thank you d. many thanks

b. Thanks so much e. not at all

c. It’s very kind of you

19. Dina : ...... I come very late today.

Manager : It doesn’t matter , please go to work.

a. Thank you c. I am sorry e. Ok

b. I am happy d. do you know?

20. Mrs. Aryani......my teacher. She always....early 

to school.

a. Is – come 

b. Is – comes 

c. Am – comes 

d. Are – come 

e. Is – coming 

21. They.....grammar in englishshop right now.

a. are study d. is studying

b. am studying e. was studying

c. are studying

tolong bantuin dong kk​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. b. Germany

2. d. English

Penjelasan:

germany menyatakan negara

English menyatakan bahasa

related_questions.question:
For questions number 18 to 20, Complete the following text with the suitable words.    Mr.Komar is an English teacher. He speak English fluently.
His wife, Mrs. Nani is a(18)......She helps sick people.
She doesn't speak English. Mr.Komar has two children.
They study English not only at school but also at home.
They are(19).....students. Their father teaches them every night,
So they can speak English (20) ......He is very proud of them.
18. a. teacher
b. janitor
c. doctor
d. chef
19. a. lazy
b. proud
c. stupid
d. diligent
20. a. fluently
b. silently
C. slowly
d. badly
This text is for questions number 21 to 23.
My favorite animal is rabbit. Rabit has two longears.
Its eyes are big and black, but when it is dark its eyes are red.
It has two long teeth Its nose is small and soft pink.
Its tail is soft,round and small like a cotton ball. Its legs are small,
It doesn't walk, it jumps It is vegetarian and its favorite food is carrct.
Rabbits are very cute.
21. How many ears does the rabbit have?
a. two ears
c. three ears
b. four ears
d. five ears​

answers.answer:
18. C. Doctor

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas menjelaskan pekerjaan Mrs. Nani yang membantu orang sakit. Jadi, jawabannya adalah (C.)

19. D. Diligent

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan mereka selalu belajar Bahasa Inggris setiap malam dan mereka sangat rajin, Jadi jawabannya adalah (D.)

20. A. Fluently

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan bahwa Mr. Komar sangat bangga dengan anak-anak nya karena bisa berbahasa Inggris dengan lancar. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

21. How many ears does the rabbit have?

: A. Two ears

Penjelasan :

Berdasarkan teks diatas, kelinci adalah binatang favorit sang penulis dan kelinci itu mempunyai 2 telinga. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

related_questions.question: Air hujan yang meresap kedalam tanah dapat membantu proses​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Proses air tanah

Air hujan turun membasahi tanah. Tanah dengan banyak tumbuhan di atasnya memiliki pori-pori, rongga, atau celah bagi air hujan.Air hujan meresap hingga kedalaman beberapa puluh meter.

Penjelasan:

Air yang terserap ke tanah akan terus bergerak hingga mencapai lapisan tertentu.

Ketika sampai di lapisan batuan yang padat, air tak bisa lewat dan mengisi rongga-rongga di sekitar atau di atasnya.

Air yang tersimpan di dalam tanah itu yang disebut dengan air tanah.Jumlah air yang meresap ke dalam tanah sangat bergantung pada jenis tanah dan batuannya.

Untuk bisa mengakses air tanah, perlu dibangun sumur. Tinggi air sumur menunjukkan tinggi muka air tanah.
Jawaban:air hujan yang meresap ke dalam tanah bisa membantu proses tumbuhan/perkembangan tumbuhan akan cepat tumbuh
